name: The Unlimited Driving Simulator
description:
The Unlimited Driving Simulator is an off-road truck driving game made for Jamulator 2021. The objective is to drive though the amazing road and reach to the destination by given time. Follow the road and mini-map. There are invisible barrier between the roads, so don't try to shortcut! You will have enough time to finish, so relax and enjoy the beautiful Scenery  as well

Also, Let us know your best time! We would love to know that... Thank you very much for reading this.

Controls:

Move Forward: W / Up Arrow

Move Backward: S / Down Arrow

Move Left: A / Left Arrow

Move Right: D / Right Arrow

Brake: Space

Pause: Tab    

Horn: H    

First Person View:  Numpad1

Third Person View: Numpad2

Light  on/off: L
